pageContent: Background: There is no available evidence from randomized trials that early detection of prostate cancer improves health outcomes, but the prostate-specific antigen (PSA) test is commonly used to screen men for prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Image-guided stereotactic body radiation therapy for clinically localized prostate cancer: preliminary clinical results
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20815418/
